import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const ProfileStatusWithHooks = (props) => { let stateWithSetState = useState(false) let [editMode] = stateWithSetState[0] let setEditMode = stateWithSetState[1] return <>
{!editMode &&
{props.status || "no status"}
}{editMode &&
}
} export default ProfileStatusWithHooks
